introduction: 一句话简介：鱼在水中游，人在地上走，鱼儿游啊游，人儿流啊流One sentence introduction:Fish swim in the water, people walk on the ground, fish swim and people flow and flow简介：秦雯丽被高考顶替长达数十年，因为偶然的见面而得知自己被顶替的真相。当她寻找到那位假“秦雯丽”后，她选择的不是报复，而是放下。现实与梦的交织，到底谁真谁假也不必深究。Introduction:Qin Wenli was replaced by the college entrance examination for decades, because she met accidentally and learned the truth of her replacement. When she found the fake "Qin Wenli", she chose not revenge, but to put it down.The interweaving of reality and dream, in the end who is true and who is false, there is no deep research.
